concept.title: Choosing the Card for You
concept.shortdesc: There are two types of cards available to Fulton County Residents: a Fulton County Library Card and the PINES E-Card.

section.title: Fulton County Library Card
section.p: A Fulton County library card is available to all residents of Fulton County.

section.title: PINES E-Card
section.p: The PINES E-Card is available to all Georgia residents, not just those residing in Fulton County.
